issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Integrate doc-comment crate to ensure readme examples remain valid
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12015](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12015). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As discussed at: <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9710#discussion_r596404956>

We can use the [doc-comment](https://crates.io/crates/doc-comment) crate to include snippets of Rust code from the readme in our doctest runs, ensuring that our documentation doesn't drift from reality as API changes are made.
